name: Aperol Spritz
description: The Aperol Spritz is a bit more adult than a soda, but still sweet and friendly, orange-and-rhubarb flavored with just a hint of grapefruit-rind bitterness.
recipeIngredient: 1 lime wheel or orange wedge for garnish

recipeInstructions.text: Fill a Collins glass or champagne flute with ice. Pour the prosecco over, then add Aperol and club soda. Garnish with a lime wheel or an orange wedge.
